thread.section_title: Agoda Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Agoda | www.agoda.com | 7 of 742
thread.title: Xa Di

author: Xa Di
title: Xa Di
text:
I was charged $179.15 for a room that was booked and cancelled 5 mins after it was booked, the booking did not have a no cancellation no amendments on the booking. I made another booking for a room at a different hotel for the same days as the one I cancelled. The second hotel I booked did have a no cancellation and no amendments allowed. When received my credit card statement I was charged for the cancelled booking.
I have since cancelled my account with this shady group.
